Mr. Pulton consider'd in his sincerity, reasonings, authorities, or, A just answer to what he hath hitherto published in his True account, his True and full account of a conference, &c. by the said Tho. Tenison. Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
[12], 100 p.
Printed for Richard Chiswell ..., London : 1687.
Half title appears before t.p. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
